issue.title: www.tsb.co.uk
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.tsb.co.uk](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tsb.co.uk) ### Comment > With AdGuard Cookie Banners filter enabled, the page doesn't show the cookie banner, but there's no scrollbar, therefore unable to view the content of any page on tsb.co.uk. With AdGuard disabled, the cookie banner is displayed, and once accepted or declined, the pages have a scrollbar. ``` Username: @XChrispy ``` ### Screenshots

Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/hieracrl0uo8sscs8wk4g8cog8wscs4823lt3nietc.png?nc=1)
